1: וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>And there came</n> שְׁנֵ֨י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>two</n> הַמַּלְאָכִ֤ים <sup>4397 </sup> <n>angels</n> סְדֹ֙מָה֙ <sup>5467 </sup> <n>to Sodom</n> בָּעֶ֔רֶב <sup>6153 </sup> <n>at even</n> וְל֖וֹט <sup>3876 </sup> <n>and Lot</n> יֹשֵׁ֣ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>sat</n> בְּשַֽׁעַר־ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>in the gate</n> סְדֹ֑ם <sup>5467 </sup> <n>of Sodom</n> וַיַּרְא־ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>seeing</n> לוֹט֙ <sup>3876 </sup> <n>and Lot</n> וַיָּ֣קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>[them] rose up</n> לִקְרָאתָ֔ם <sup>7125 </sup> <n>to meet</n> וַיִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>them and he bowed</n> אַפַּ֖יִם <sup>639 </sup> <n>himself with his face</n> אָֽרְצָה׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>toward the ground</n>
2: וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> הִנֶּ֣ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> נָּא־ <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Now</n> אֲדֹנַ֗י <sup>113 </sup> <n>Behold now my lords</n> ס֣וּרוּ <sup>5493 </sup> <n>turn in</n> נָ֠א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>please</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> בֵּ֨ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> עַבְדְּכֶ֤ם <sup>5650 </sup> <n>I pray you into your servant's</n> וְלִ֙ינוּ֙ <sup>3885 </sup> <n>and tarry all night</n> וְרַחֲצ֣וּ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>and wash</n> רַגְלֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>7272 </sup> <n>your feet</n> וְהִשְׁכַּמְתֶּ֖ם <sup>7925 </sup> <n>and ye shall rise up early</n> וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֣ם <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and go</n> לְדַרְכְּכֶ֑ם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>on your ways</n> וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they said</n> לֹּ֔א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>No</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>in</n> בָרְח֖וֹב <sup>7339 </sup> <n>in the street</n> נָלִֽין׃ <sup>3885 </sup> <n>all night</n>
3: וַיִּפְצַר־ <sup>6484 </sup> <n>And he pressed</n> בָּ֣ם מְאֹ֔ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>upon them greatly</n> וַיָּסֻ֣רוּ <sup>5493 </sup> <n>and they turned in</n> אֵלָ֔יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>unto him and entered</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> בֵּית֑וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into his house</n> וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and he made</n> לָהֶם֙ מִשְׁתֶּ֔ה <sup>4960 </sup> <n>them a feast</n> וּמַצּ֥וֹת <sup>4682 </sup> <n>unleavened bread</n> אָפָ֖ה <sup>644 </sup> <n>and did bake</n> וַיֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and they did eat</n>
4: טֶרֶם֮ <sup>2962 </sup> <n>Before</n> יִשְׁכָּבוּ֒ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>But before they lay down</n> וְאַנְשֵׁ֨י <sup>582 </sup> <n>the men</n> הָעִ֜יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> אַנְשֵׁ֤י <sup>582 </sup> <n>[even] the men</n> סְדֹם֙ <sup>5467 </sup> <n>of Sodom</n> נָסַ֣בּוּ <sup>5437 </sup> <n>round</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הַבַּ֔יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>the house</n> מִנַּ֖עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>and young</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> זָקֵ֑ן <sup>2205 </sup> <n>both old</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>all the people</n> מִקָּצֶֽה׃ <sup>7097 </sup> <n>from every quarter</n>
5: וַיִּקְרְא֤וּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>And they called</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> לוֹט֙ <sup>3876 </sup> <n>unto Lot</n> וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> ל֔וֹ אַיֵּ֧ה <sup>346 </sup> <n>Where</n> הָאֲנָשִׁ֛ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>are the men</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בָּ֥אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>which came in</n> אֵלֶ֖יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַלָּ֑יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>night</n> הוֹצִיאֵ֣ם <sup>3318 </sup> <n>out</n> אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> וְנֵדְעָ֖ה <sup>3045 </sup> <n>unto us that we may know</n> אֹתָֽם׃ <sup>853 </sup>
6: וַיֵּצֵ֧א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>went out</n> אֲלֵהֶ֛ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>But</n> ל֖וֹט <sup>3876 </sup> <n>And Lot</n> הַפֶּ֑תְחָה <sup>6607 </sup> <n>at the door</n> וְהַדֶּ֖לֶת <sup>1817 </sup> <n>the door</n> סָגַ֥ר <sup>5462 </sup> <n>unto them and shut</n> אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <sup>310 </sup> <n>after him</n>
7: וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And said</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> נָ֥א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> אַחַ֖י <sup>251 </sup> <n>I pray you brethren</n> תָּרֵֽעוּ׃ <sup>7489 </sup> <n>do not so wickedly</n>
8: הִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> נָ֨א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Now</n> לִ֜י שְׁתֵּ֣י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>Behold now I have two</n> בָנ֗וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>daughters</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> יָדְעוּ֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>which have not known</n> אִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> אוֹצִֽיאָה־ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>let me I pray you bring them out</n> נָּ֤א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>please</n> אֶתְהֶן֙ <sup>853 </sup> אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> וַעֲשׂ֣וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>unto you and do</n> לָהֶ֔ן כַּטּ֖וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>ye to them as [is] good</n> בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in your eyes</n> רַ֠ק <sup>7535 </sup> <n>but</n> לָֽאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> הָאֵל֙ <sup>411 </sup> <n>only unto these</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> תַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>do</n> דָבָ֔ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>act</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֥ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>as they</n> בָּ֖אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>for therefore came</n> בְּצֵ֥ל <sup>6738 </sup> <n>they under the shadow</n> קֹרָתִֽי׃ <sup>6982 </sup> <n>of my roof</n>
9: וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ ׀ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they said</n> גֶּשׁ־ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>Stand</n> הָ֗לְאָה <sup>1973 </sup> <n>back</n> וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they said</n> הָאֶחָ֤ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>[again] This one</n> בָּֽא־ <sup>935 </sup> <n>[fellow] came in</n> לָגוּר֙ <sup>1481 </sup> <n>to sojourn</n> וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֣ט <sup>8199 </sup> <n>and he will needs</n> שָׁפ֔וֹט <sup>8199 </sup> <n>be a judge</n> עַתָּ֕ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> נָרַ֥ע <sup>7489 </sup> <n>now will we deal worse</n> לְךָ֖ מֵהֶ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>they</n> וַיִּפְצְר֨וּ <sup>6484 </sup> <n>with thee than with them And they pressed</n> בָאִ֤ישׁ <sup>582 </sup> <n>against</n> בְּלוֹט֙ <sup>3876 </sup> <n>[even] Lot</n> מְאֹ֔ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>sore</n> וַֽיִּגְּשׁ֖וּ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>and came near</n> לִשְׁבֹּ֥ר <sup>7665 </sup> <n>to break</n> הַדָּֽלֶת׃ <sup>1817 </sup> <n>the door</n>
10: וַיִּשְׁלְח֤וּ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>put forth</n> הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יָדָ֔ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>their hand</n> וַיָּבִ֧יאוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and pulled</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> ל֛וֹט <sup>3876 </sup> <n>Lot</n> אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> הַבָּ֑יְתָה <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into the house</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַדֶּ֖לֶת <sup>1817 </sup> <n>to the door</n> סָגָֽרוּ׃ <sup>5462 </sup> <n>to them and shut</n>
11: וְֽאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאֲנָשִׁ֞ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> פֶּ֣תַח <sup>6607 </sup> <n>that [were] at the door</n> הַבַּ֗יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> הִכּוּ֙ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>And they smote</n> בַּסַּנְוֵרִ֔ים <sup>5575 </sup> <n>with blindness</n> מִקָּטֹ֖ן <sup>6996 </sup> <n>both small</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> גָּד֑וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>and great</n> וַיִּלְא֖וּ <sup>3811 </sup> <n>so that they wearied</n> לִמְצֹ֥א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>themselves to find</n> הַפָּֽתַח׃ <sup>6607 </sup> <n>the door</n>
12: וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> הָאֲנָשִׁ֜ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> ל֗וֹט <sup>3876 </sup> <n>unto Lot</n> עֹ֚ד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>else</n> מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>any</n> לְךָ֣ פֹ֔ה <sup>6311 </sup> <n>Hast thou here</n> חָתָן֙ <sup>2860 </sup> <n>besides? son in law</n> וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and thy sons</n> וּבְנֹתֶ֔יךָ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and thy daughters</n> וְכֹ֥ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>and whatsoever</n> לְךָ֖ בָּעִ֑יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>thou hast in the city</n> הוֹצֵ֖א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>bring [them] out</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> הַמָּקֽוֹם׃ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>of this place</n>
13: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> מַשְׁחִתִ֣ים <sup>7843 </sup> <n>us to destroy</n> אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>For we</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמָּק֖וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>this place</n> הַזֶּ֑ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>so</n> גָֽדְלָ֤ה <sup>1431 </sup> <n>is waxen great</n> צַעֲקָתָם֙ <sup>6818 </sup> <n>because the cry of them</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>before</n> פְּנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>the face</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וַיְשַׁלְּחֵ֥נוּ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>hath sent</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> לְשַׁחֲתָֽהּ׃ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>to destroy</n>
14: וַיֵּצֵ֨א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>went out</n> ל֜וֹט <sup>3876 </sup> <n>And Lot</n> וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר ׀ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and spake</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to his</n> חֲתָנָ֣יו ׀ <sup>2860 </sup> <n>unto his sons in law</n> לֹקְחֵ֣י <sup>3947 </sup> <n>which married</n> בְנֹתָ֗יו <sup>1323 </sup> <n>his daughters</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> ק֤וּמוּ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>Up</n> צְּאוּ֙ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>get you out</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> הַמָּק֣וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>of this place</n> הַזֶּ֔ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>of this</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> מַשְׁחִ֥ית <sup>7843 </sup> <n>will destroy</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעִ֑יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>this city</n> וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִמְצַחֵ֖ק <sup>6711 </sup> <n>But he seemed as one that mocked</n> בְּעֵינֵ֥י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>unto</n> חֲתָנָֽיו׃ <sup>2860 </sup> <n>his sons in law</n>
15: וּכְמוֹ֙ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>And when</n> הַשַּׁ֣חַר <sup>7837 </sup> <n>the morning</n> עָלָ֔ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>arose</n> וַיָּאִ֥יצוּ <sup>213 </sup> <n>hastened</n> הַמַּלְאָכִ֖ים <sup>4397 </sup> <n>then the angels</n> בְּל֣וֹט <sup>3876 </sup> <n>Lot</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> קוּם֩ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>Arise</n> קַ֨ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>take</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> אִשְׁתְּךָ֜ <sup>802 </sup> <n>thy wife</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁתֵּ֤י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>and thy two</n> בְנֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>daughters</n> הַנִּמְצָאֹ֔ת <sup>4672 </sup> <n>which are here</n> פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>or</n> תִּסָּפֶ֖ה <sup>5595 </sup> <n>lest thou be consumed</n> בַּעֲוֹ֥ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>in the iniquity</n> הָעִֽיר׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n>
16: וַֽיִּתְמַהְמָ֓הּ ׀ <sup>4102 </sup> <n>And while he lingered</n> וַיַּחֲזִ֨קוּ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>laid hold</n> הָאֲנָשִׁ֜ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> בְּיָד֣וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>upon his hand</n> וּבְיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>and upon the hand</n> אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <sup>802 </sup> <n>of his wife</n> וּבְיַד֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>and upon the hand</n> שְׁתֵּ֣י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>of his two</n> בְנֹתָ֔יו <sup>1323 </sup> <n>daughters</n> בְּחֶמְלַ֥ת <sup>2551 </sup> <n>being merciful</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> עָלָ֑יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and they</n> וַיֹּצִאֻ֥הוּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>unto him and they brought him forth</n> וַיַּנִּחֻ֖הוּ <sup>3240 </sup> <n>and set him</n> מִח֥וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>without</n> לָעִֽיר׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the city</n>
17: וַיְהִי֩ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כְהוֹצִיאָ֨ם <sup>3318 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when they had brought them forth</n> אֹתָ֜ם <sup>853 </sup> הַח֗וּצָה <sup>2351 </sup> <n>abroad</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>that he said</n> הִמָּלֵ֣ט <sup>4422 </sup> <n>Escape</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> נַפְשֶׁ֔ךָ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>thy life</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תַּבִּ֣יט <sup>5027 </sup> <n>look</n> אַחֲרֶ֔יךָ <sup>310 </sup> <n>not behind thee</n> וְאַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תַּעֲמֹ֖ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>neither stay</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>anywhere</n> הַכִּכָּ֑ר <sup>3603 </sup> <n>thou in all the plain</n> הָהָ֥רָה <sup>2022 </sup> <n>to the mountain</n> הִמָּלֵ֖ט <sup>4422 </sup> <n>escape</n> פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>or</n> תִּסָּפֶֽה׃ <sup>5595 </sup> <n>lest thou be consumed</n>
18: וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> ל֖וֹט <sup>3876 </sup> <n>And Lot</n> אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>no</n> נָ֖א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Oh</n> אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <sup>136 </sup> <n>my lords</n>

35: וַתַּשְׁקֶ֜יןָ <sup>8248 </sup> <n>drink</n> גַּ֣ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> בַּלַּ֧יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>night</n> הַה֛וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>that</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲבִיהֶ֖ן <sup>1 </sup> <n>their father</n> יָ֑יִן <sup>3196 </sup> <n>wine</n> וַתָּ֤קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>arose</n> הַצְּעִירָה֙ <sup>6810 </sup> <n>also and the younger</n> וַתִּשְׁכַּ֣ב <sup>7901 </sup> <n>and lay</n> עִמּ֔וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יָדַ֥ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>with him and he perceived</n> בְּשִׁכְבָ֖הּ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>not when she lay down</n> וּבְקֻמָֽהּ׃ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>nor when she arose</n>
36: וַֽתַּהֲרֶ֛יןָ <sup>2029 </sup> <n>with child</n> שְׁתֵּ֥י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>Thus were both</n> בְנֽוֹת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>the daughters</n> ל֖וֹט <sup>3876 </sup> <n>of Lot</n> מֵאֲבִיהֶֽן׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>by their father</n>
37: וַתֵּ֤לֶד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>bare</n> הַבְּכִירָה֙ <sup>1067 </sup> <n>And the firstborn</n> בֵּ֔ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>a son</n> וַתִּקְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and called</n> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> מוֹאָ֑ב <sup>4124 </sup> <n>Moab</n> ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>the same</n> אֲבִֽי־ <sup>1 </sup> <n>[is] the father</n> מוֹאָ֖ב <sup>4124 </sup> <n>of the Moabites</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>to this</n> הַיּֽוֹם׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>unto this day</n>
38: וְהַצְּעִירָ֤ה <sup>6810 </sup> <n>And the younger</n> גַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> הִוא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יָ֣לְדָה <sup>3205 </sup> <n>she also bare</n> בֵּ֔ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>a son</n> וַתִּקְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and called</n> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> בֶּן־ עַמִּ֑י <sup>1151 </sup> <n>Benammi</n> ה֛וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> אֲבִ֥י <sup>1 </sup> <n>the same [is] the father</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> עַמּ֖וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>to this</n> הַיּֽוֹם׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>unto this day</n> ס
